T03D3797:110a-1: pra dznya p'a ra mi t'a pint'a rtha n'a ma /
T03D3797:110a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T03D3797:110a-4: dang po yum la dang ba skyed pa'i don du
T03D3797:110a-5: mkhyen pa gsum gyi yon tan gyi sgo nas yum
T03D3797:110a-7: de nas 'phags pa byams pa bdag nyid kyi bstan
T03D3797:110a-8: bcos don lnga dang ldan par ston par bzhed pas
T03D3797:110a-13: blo dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
T03D3797:110a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mngon
T03D3797:110a-15: sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
T03D3797:110a-17: / bde blag tu rtogs pa ni rtsom pa'i dngos kyi dgos pa'o //
T03D3797:110a-18: de nas tshigs su bcad pa bco lngas shes rab
T03D3797:110a-19: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus rnam par gzhag
T03D3797:110a-20: pa bstan to // de la dang po gnyis kyis mdor bstan la /
T03D3797:110a-21: bcu gsum gyis ni cung zhig rgyas par bstan to //
T03D3797:110a-22: mdo'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang po gnyis kyis shes
T03D3797:110a-23: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun mngon par
T03D3797:110a-24: rtogs pa brgyad du bsdus par bstan to //
T03D3797:110a-28: de la grangs nges pa ni mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3797:110a-29: brgyad ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyis rnam
T03D3797:110b-1: rgyu ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba'i bye
T03D3797:110b-2: brag gis mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa bdun yin
T03D3797:110b-4: mkhyen pa gsum ni dmigs pa bstan pa'o //
T03D3797:110b-5: lhag ma mngon par rtogs pa bzhi ni sbyor ba'o //
T03D3797:110b-7: de la bdun tsam gyis ni mi rdzogs la /
T03D3797:110b-8: dgu phan chad ni 'bras bu med pas grangs nges pa'o //
T03D3797:110b-9: go rims nges pa ni 'bras bu la brod pa
T03D3797:110b-10: skyed pa'i don du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3797:110b-12: de nyid lam goms pa las byung bas de'i rjes la lam shes pa bstan to //
T03D3797:110b-13: de nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i bdag
T03D3797:110b-14: nyid yin pas spang bya bzhi shes de'i rjes la
T03D3797:110b-15: bstan to // 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa thob
T03D3797:110b-16: par 'dod pas sgrub pa nyams su blang dgos pas
T03D3797:110b-17: bstan to // / de yang las dang po pa'i
T03D3797:110b-18: gnas skabs nas yin pas las dang po pa'i gnas
T03D3797:110b-19: skabs su go cha'i sgrub pa'i bdag nyid rnam pa
T03D3797:110b-20: kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
T03D3797:110b-21: bstan to // / de'i sbyor ba'o // de nyid
T03D3797:110b-22: mthar thug pa las 'jug pa'i sgrub pa'i bdag nyid
T03D3797:110b-23: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rab
T03D3797:110b-24: bstan to // / de'i sbyor ba'o // kyi sbyor
T03D3797:110b-25: ba'o // rtse mo de nyid kyi dbang du bya
T03D3797:110b-26: bstan to // / de'i sbyor ba'o // kyi sbyor
T03D3797:110b-27: ba'o // ba'i phyir ram ; nyams na gso ba'i
T03D3797:110b-28: bstan to // / de'i sbyor ba'o // kyi sbyor
T03D3797:110b-29: ba'o // ba'i phyir ram ; don / tshogs kyi
T03D3797:110b-30: sgrub pa'i bdag nyid mthar gyis pa zhes bya ba
T03D3797:110b-32: de nyid mthar thug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub
T03D3797:110b-33: pa'i bdag nyid skad cig ma gcig la mngon par
T03D3797:110b-34: rtogs pa zhes bya ba mthar phyin pa'i sbyor ba'o
T03D3797:110b-35: // de'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'bras bu
T03D3797:110b-36: chos kyi sku 'byung bas brgyad pa la 'bras bu
T03D3797:110b-37: chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa'o //
T03D3797:110b-38: de ni go rims nges pa'o //
T03D3797:110b-39: don brgyad po de yang bsdus na rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3797:110b-41: yang na rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3797:110b-45: de la dang po gsum ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3797:110b-49: mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba'i bye brag gis rnam
T03D3797:110b-50: par kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs
T03D3797:111a-1: mngon par rtogs pa brgyad du nges par bstan pa
T03D3797:111a-2: ni dbang po rtul po dang 'bring gi dbang du
T03D3797:111a-3: byas pa'o // rnon po la ni drug gis mchog go //
T03D3797:111a-4: sgrub pa bzhi lam dang sbyar na go cha'i sbyor ba'i lam /
T03D3797:111a-7: nges par 'byung ba bsgom pa'i lam gyi khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus te /
T03D3797:111a-8: mdor na rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs
T03D3797:111a-9: pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa bzhi'i ngo
T03D3797:111a-10: bo nyid do // rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs
T03D3797:111a-11: par rtogs pa tshogs kyi lam gyis bsdus pa ma
T03D3797:111a-12: bo nyid do // yin nam / ji ltar go cha sbyor ba'i lam yin zhe na /
T03D3797:111a-13: go cha'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi gnas
T03D3797:111a-14: skabs su rdzogs pa la dgongs pas na sbyor ba'i
T03D3797:111a-18: nges par 'byung ba ni mthong ba dang /
T03D3797:111a-20: khyad par gyi gnas skabs su rdzogs pas na lam de dag gi rang bzhin du brjod do //
T03D3797:111a-21: de ni mdor bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi don to /
T03D3797:111a-23: // / don brgyad po de yang re re nas bstan
T03D3797:111a-24: pa'i phyir dang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3797:111a-25: nyid ni don bcus bstan to //
T03D3797:111a-26: de la so so'i skye bo dang /
T03D3797:111a-27: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed las
T03D3797:111a-28: khyad par du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
T03D3797:111a-29: / sems bskyed pa mngon sum du bya ba'i don
T03D3797:111a-30: du'am 'phel bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir gdams ngag
T03D3797:111a-31: / go // gdams ngag gi sgo nas sems bskyed pa ci ltar 'phel zhe na /
T03D3797:111a-32: gdams ngag yod na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la dad pa dang /
T03D3797:111a-34: byang chub kyi sems la sems rtse gcig tu skye ba 'byung bas na ting nge 'dzin dang /
T03D3797:111a-35: byang chub kyi sems yang nas yang du dran pa 'byung bas na dran pa dang /
T03D3797:111a-36: byang chub kyi sems ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i
T03D3797:111a-37: shes rab la sogs pa thar pa'i cha dang mthun
T03D3797:111a-38: pa dang de bzhin du rim pa bzhin du 'byung
T03D3797:111a-39: bas de ltar na gdams ngag gi sgo nas sems
T03D3797:111a-41: gdams ngag dang ldan pa las dbang po dang stobs
T03D3797:111a-42: kyi bdag nyid kyi dad pa la sogs pa bskyed
T03D3797:111b-0: pas nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag rnam pa @111b
T03D3797:111b-1: bzhi bstan to // de la gtsub shing gtsubs pa'i
T03D3797:111b-2: gnas skabs su dang po grang ba'i reg pa sel
T03D3797:111b-3: mi nus pa'i dro ba tsam 'byung ba bzhin du
T03D3797:111b-4: ma dad pa la sogs pa bas stobs chung ba'i
T03D3797:111b-5: dad pa la sogs pa lnga ni drod ces bya'o
T03D3797:111b-6: bzhi bstan to // // mnyam par gyur pa'i gnas skabs na ni rtse mo zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:111b-7: drod dang rtse mo'i gnas skabs kyi dad pa la
T03D3797:111b-8: sogs pa lnga ni mya ngan las 'das pa la
T03D3797:111b-10: spang bya spong mi nus pa'i phyir dbang po lnga zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:111b-11: ma dad pa la sogs pa bas stobs che ba'i gnas skabs na ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:111b-12: ma dad pa la sogs pa ma lus par spong
T03D3797:111b-13: nus pa'i gnas skabs na ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
T03D3797:111b-15: bzod pa dang chos mchog gi gnas skabs na ni
T03D3797:111b-16: ma dad pa la sogs pa 'joms nus pas stobs
T03D3797:111b-17: zhes bya'o // sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i chos
T03D3797:111b-18: de dag kyang rigs dang ldan pa la skye bas
T03D3797:111b-19: zhes bya'o // / sgrub pa'i rten theg pa chen po'i rigs bstan to //
T03D3797:111b-20: rigs dang ldan pa de la yang sgrub pa nyams
T03D3797:111b-21: su blangs pa las 'byung bas sgrub pa nyams su
T03D3797:111b-22: len pa'i dmigs pa bstan to //
T03D3797:111b-23: nyams su len pa de yang 'bras bu med par
T03D3797:111b-24: ma yin pas chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid kyi 'bras
T03D3797:111b-25: bu ched du bya ba rnam pa gsum bstan to
T03D3797:111b-26: // 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i don du lam
T03D3797:111b-27: la nan tan du bya dgos pas spro ba'i brtson
T03D3797:111b-28: 'grus kyi go cha'i sgrub pa bstan to //
T03D3797:111b-29: go bgos pa de las 'jug pa 'byung bas 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bstan to //
T03D3797:111b-30: 'jug pa dang ldan pa las bsod nams dang ye
T03D3797:111b-31: shes kyi tshogs 'byung bas tshogs kyi sgrub pa bstan
T03D3797:111b-32: to // tshogs bsags pa las nges par 'byung ba'i
T03D3797:111b-33: sgrub pa 'byung bas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa
T03D3797:111b-34: to // bstan to // mdor na sgrub pa rnam
T03D3797:111b-35: pa bzhi ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par
T03D3797:111b-36: rtogs pa la sogs pa sbyor ba bzhi'i bdag nyid
T03D3797:111b-37: to // bstan to // de / de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03D3797:111b-38: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam thams cad shes
T03D3797:111b-39: par bya dgos pas dang por nyan thos byang chub
T03D3797:111b-40: sems dpa'i lam shes pa ngas sangs rgyas kyi 'od
T03D3797:111b-41: kyis lha rnams kyi rnam smin gyi 'od zil gyis
T03D3797:112a-0: mnan pa la sogs pa rnam @112a * //
T03D3797:112a-1: pa lnga ni lam shes pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3797:112a-2: de ltar snod du dung ba la sogs pa rnam
T03D3797:112a-3: pa lnga dang ldan pas lam thams cad shes par
T03D3797:112a-4: bya dgos pas dang por nyan thos dang rang sangs
T03D3797:112a-6: 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba'i lam bstan to //
T03D3797:112a-7: de'i yon tan phyir mi ldog pa gzhan gyi yon tan ni skye ba snga phyi'i shes rab po //
T03D3797:112a-8: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ci ste ma smos she na /
T03D3797:112a-9: skabs dang por smos zin pas na 'dir ma smos so //
T03D3797:112a-10: 'o na mthong ba'i lam yang smos zin pas na 'dir ci ste zhe na ma yin te /
T03D3797:112a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni chos nyid kyi rnam pa'i tshul gyis gzigs la /
T03D3797:112a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni gnyen po'i tshul tsam du shes pa /
T03D3797:112a-13: skabs dang po mthong ba'i lam las logs shig tu byang chub sems pa'i mthong ba'i lam bstan to //
T03D3797:112a-14: nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag ni las dang po pa'i sas bsdus la /
T03D3797:112a-15: las dang po pa'i gnas skabs na ni gnyis ka
T03D3797:112a-16: yang khyad par med pas logs shig tu ma byas
T03D3797:112a-17: so // des ni sngar ma thob pa thob pas na mthong ba'i lam bstan to //
T03D3797:112a-18: thob pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pas na bsgom pa'i lam bstan to //
T03D3797:112a-19: mdor bsdus na rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3797:112a-20: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'o //
T03D3797:112a-21: de la zag pa dang bcas pa ni sbyor ba
T03D3797:112a-22: dang dngos dang mjug gi bye brag gis mos pa
T03D3797:112a-23: dang bsngo ba dang rjes su yi rang ba gsum
T03D3797:112a-24: yin la / zag pa med pa ni sgrub pa dang shin tu rnam dag gnyis so //
T03D3797:112a-25: de ltar na bsgom pa'i lam rnam pa lnga'o //
T03D3797:112a-26: ci'i phyir byed pa logs su ma smos she na /
T03D3797:112a-27: byed pa dang bcas pa'i dbye ba rnam pa lnga yin pas logs shig tu ma smos so //
T03D3797:112a-28: bstod pa dang bkur ba dang bsngags pa ni mos
T03D3797:112a-29: pa rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i bye brag gis
T03D3797:112a-30: rnam pa gsum la gsum du yin pas mos pa
T03D3797:112a-31: ni gnas skabs logs shig tu ma smos so //
T03D3797:112a-32: ci ltar mos pa re re la chung du la
T03D3797:112a-33: sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa nyi shu rtsa
T03D3797:112a-34: bdun du 'gyur ba de bzhin du mos pa dgu
T03D3797:112b-0: tshan gsum la bstod pa dang bkur @112b ba dang
T03D3797:112b-1: bsngags pa dang / dgu tshan gsum du 'gyur pas de nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
T03D3797:112b-2: de ltar bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam pa lnga'o //
T03D3797:112b-3: lnga po de dang de dag nyid sa gang dang gang gis bsdus she na /
T03D3797:112b-4: mos pa ni sa gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pas bsdus so //
T03D3797:112b-5: bsngo ba ni sa lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pas bsdus so //
T03D3797:112b-6: rjes su yi rang ba ni sa brgyad pa dang /
T03D3797:112b-8: sgrub pa dang shin tu rnam par dag pa ni sa bcu pas bsdus so //
T03D3797:112b-9: ci'i phyir mos pa rnam pa gsum zhe na /
T03D3797:112b-10: de la rang gi don du mos pa ni chos
T03D3797:112b-11: kyi sku thob par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin la
T03D3797:112b-12: / gzhan gyi don du mos pa ni sprul pa'i sku thob par byed pa'i rgyun mtshan yin te /
T03D3797:112b-13: gnyis ka'i don du mos pa ni longs spyod rdzogs
T03D3797:112b-14: pa'i sku thob par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pas
T03D3797:112b-15: mos pa ni rnam pa gsum gsum mo //
T03D3797:112b-16: mos pa dang bsngo ba dang rjes su yi rang
T03D3797:112b-17: ba ni las dang po pa'i gnas skabs na yang
T03D3797:112b-19: ci'i phyir bsgom lam la de gsum gzhag ce na /
T03D3797:112b-20: mtshan nyid pa ni bsgom pa'i lam na yod pas bsgom lam du smos so //
T03D3797:112b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi mi mthun
T03D3797:112b-22: pa'i phyogs bstan pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams kyi thams
T03D3797:112b-23: cad shes pa nyid bstan to //
T03D3797:112b-24: de la dngos su ni blang bar bya ba nyin
T03D3797:112b-25: pas byang chub sems dpa'i lam blang bar bya bar
T03D3797:112b-26: ston la / nyan thos kyi lam ni dor bar bya ba yin pas de'i shugs la ston to //
T03D3797:112b-27: de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3797:112b-28: ni stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis srid
T03D3797:112b-29: pa ste 'khor ba la mi gnas /
T03D3797:112b-30: snying rjes zhi ba ste mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so zhes bstan pas /
T03D3797:112b-31: nyan thos rnams ni shes rab dang snying rje dang
T03D3797:112b-32: bral bas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas
T03D3797:112b-33: gnas zhes bya bar shugs la rtogs so //
T03D3797:112b-34: nyan thos rnams kyi lam ni thabs ma yin pas
T03D3797:112b-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring
T03D3797:112b-36: ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni thabs yin pas nye ba nyid yin no //
T03D3797:112b-37: nyan thos kyi lam ni thabs ma yin pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin la /
T03D3797:113a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni thabs yin @113a * //
T03D3797:113a-2: de'i 'og tu sbyar ba dang mnyam pa nyid du bstan /
T03D3797:113a-3: de la sbyor ba ni drod dang rtse mo'i dbang bcu'o //
T03D3797:113a-4: mnyam pa nyid ni bzod pa dang chos mchog gi stobs bcu'o //
T03D3797:113a-5: nyan thos kyi sbyor ba dang mnyam pa nyid ni de'i shugs la rtogs so //
T03D3797:113a-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthong lam sbyor lam bstan nas /
T03D3797:113a-7: nyan thos kyi lam shugs la rtogs so //
T03D3797:113a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang nyan thos kyi lam
T03D3797:113a-9: lam shes kyi skabs su bstan pa ma yin nam
T03D3797:113a-10: / 'di yang lam yin na ci'i phyir zlos par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3797:113a-12: dper na mi'i ngo bo gcig yin du zin kyang
T03D3797:113a-13: 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang du ba bskyed pa'i
T03D3797:113a-14: bye brag gis mi 'dra ba bzhin du mkhyen pa
T03D3797:113a-15: gsum ka lam yin du zin kyang /
T03D3797:113a-16: dang pos ni chos nyid kyi rnam pa'i tshul du bstan la /
T03D3797:113a-17: gnyis pas ni gnyen po tsam zhig bstan te /
T03D3797:113a-18: gsum pas ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T03D3797:113a-19: kyi sgo nas bstan pas zlos pa'i nyes pa med
T03D3797:113a-20: do // mthong ba'i lam bzhin du mi mthun pa'i
T03D3797:113a-21: phyogs shugs la bstan pa'i don du bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3797:113a-22: yang ci ste mi ston zhe na /
T03D3797:113a-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nyan thos kyi lam
T03D3797:113a-24: mngon sum du bya ba yin pas mthong ba'i lam
T03D3797:113a-25: ni bstan la / lam gyi 'bras bu ni thob
T03D3797:113a-26: par bya ba ma yin pas nyan thos kyi bsgom
T03D3797:113a-27: pa'i lam ni ma bstan to //
T03D3797:113a-28: 'o na mthong ba'i lam yang gzhan gyi don du ma yin nam /
T03D3797:113a-29: de bzhin du nyan thos kyi bsgom pa'i lam yang
T03D3797:113a-30: gzhan gyi don du ci ste mi ston zhe na
T03D3797:113a-31: / bden mod kyi bsgom pa'i lam ni dngos su
T03D3797:113a-32: byang chub thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pas byang chub
T03D3797:113a-33: sems dpa' rnams kyang nyan thos kyi byang chub thob
T03D3797:113a-34: par 'dod pa na dam bcas pa nyams pa'i dogs
T03D3797:113a-35: par 'gyur bas bsgom pa'i lam ni ma bshad do
T03D3797:113a-36: / // de ltar na mkhyen pa gsum dmigs pa'i yul bstan nas /
T03D3797:113a-37: 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed pa'i
T03D3797:113a-38: sbyor ba las dang po pa'i sas bsdus pa rnam
T03D3797:113a-39: pa kun mngon par rtogs pa'i sbyor ba bstan par
T03D3797:113a-40: bya ste / de la mkhyen pa gsum ka'i rnam pa kun mngon par rtogs pa ni gnyis te /
T03D3797:113b-0: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs @113b kyis bsdus pa dang /
T03D3797:113b-1: rnal 'byor ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'o //
T03D3797:113b-2: de la so so'i skye bo'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa ni rjes su dpag pas shes la /
T03D3797:113b-3: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa ni rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gyis shes so //
T03D3797:113b-4: de la so so'i skye bo'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa ni rgyu yin la /
T03D3797:113b-5: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa ni 'bras bu'o //
T03D3797:113b-6: don bcu gcig po thams cad dang po gtan la 'bebs pa dang /
T03D3797:113b-7: sgrub pa nyams su len pa'i bye brag gis tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T03D3797:113b-8: sgrub pa nyams su len pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T03D3797:113b-9: de la dang po sems ma bskyed pa'i gong rol
T03D3797:113b-10: nas rnam pa zhes bya ba nas thabs mkhas pa'i
T03D3797:113b-11: bar du shes par byed pa ni yongs su tshol
T03D3797:113b-12: ba'i sbyor ba'o // shes nas de thams cad nyams
T03D3797:113b-13: su len pa ni nyams su len pa'i sbyor ba'o
T03D3797:113b-14: ba'i sbyor ba'o // // de la dang po mkhyen
T03D3797:113b-15: pa gsum gyi rnam pa so so'i skye bo'i rgyud
T03D3797:113b-17: so so'i skye bo'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa
T03D3797:113b-18: rnams bsgom pa las rnal 'byor pa'i rnam pa bskyed
T03D3797:113b-19: pa'i don du sbyor ba nyi shu bstan /
T03D3797:113b-20: de la lnga ni tshogs lam gyis bsdus la /
T03D3797:113b-21: bco lnga ni sbyor lam nas sa bcu'i bar gyis bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-22: de la sbyor ba phyin ci ma log par bsgoms
T03D3797:113b-23: na yon tan 'byung bas yon tan bcu bzhi bstan
T03D3797:113b-24: / yon tan bcu bzhi sa dang sbyar na bzhi ni nges par 'byed pas bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-25: lhag ma bcu ni sa dang po nas sa bcu pa'i bar gyis bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-26: sbyor ba phyin ci log tu bsgoms na skyon 'byung
T03D3797:113b-27: bas sbyor ba'i skyon bzhi bcu rtsa drug tu bstan
T03D3797:113b-28: / de la bcu ni tshogs lam gyis bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-29: bcu ni drod kyis bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-30: bcu ni rtse mos bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-31: bcu ni bzod pas bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-32: drug ni chos mchog gis bsdus so //
T03D3797:113b-33: de la sbyor ba khyad par can rgyud la skyes
T03D3797:113b-34: par mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas shes pas mtshan nyid
T03D3797:113b-35: dgu bcu rtsa gcig bstan to //
T03D3797:113b-36: de la shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni phyogs chos /
T03D3797:113b-37: byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i tshul /
T03D3797:113b-38: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog pa'i tshul /
T03D3797:114a-0: ngo bo nyid ni rtags kyis mtshon @114a * //
T03D3797:114a-2: de la rang gi rgyud la gtan la 'bebs par
T03D3797:114a-3: byed pa'i tshe ni mkhyen pa gsum chos can no
T03D3797:114a-4: // gzhan gyi rgyud la gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i tshe ni skyes bu chos can no //
T03D3797:114a-5: rtags dang rtags kyis mtshon pa'i sbyor ba lngas ni thar pa'i cha dang mdun pa dang /
T03D3797:114a-6: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang ldan
T03D3797:114a-7: pa'i skyes bu las 'byung bas thar pa'i cha dang
T03D3797:114a-8: mthun pa dang / nges par 'byed pa bstan de
T03D3797:114a-9: la yongs su tshol ba'i dus ni mtshan nyid shes
T03D3797:114a-11: rtags dang rtags can las sbyor ba skyes par shes pa ni thar pa cha dang mthun pa dang /
T03D3797:114a-12: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu las 'byung ngo //
T03D3797:114a-13: de ltar sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs bstan /
T03D3797:114a-14: nges 'byed ma thob pa'i dus na ni sems mi brtan la /
T03D3797:114a-15: nges 'byed thob yan chad ni sems brtan pa thob pa 'byung bas phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:114a-16: de la zhing dag pa ni bar chad med pa'i
T03D3797:114a-17: ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no
T03D3797:114a-18: // thabs la mkhas pa ni log par rtog pa sel ba'i rgyu yin no //
T03D3797:114a-19: 'o na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa
T03D3797:114a-20: skabs 'og ma gnyis la ci'i phyir ston zhe na
T03D3797:114a-21: ; chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag
T03D3797:114a-22: gis 'di dang 'og ma gnyis te gsum ka la
T03D3797:114a-23: ; bstan to // mdor na las dang po pa'i
T03D3797:114a-24: gnas skabs na lam thams can ni thabs dang thabs
T03D3797:114a-25: las byung ba shes pa dang /
T03D3797:114a-26: lam thams cad kyi sbyor ba nyams su len pa
T03D3797:114a-27: ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa
T03D3797:114a-28: zhes bya'o // de ltar na rnam pa kun mngon
T03D3797:114a-29: par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su lam thams
T03D3797:114a-30: cad kyi sbyor ba nyams su blangs pa ni de'i
T03D3797:114a-32: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa mthar
T03D3797:114a-33: phyin pa las de'i rab ces bya ba'i rtse mo'i
T03D3797:114a-34: mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa 'byung bas rtse mo'i
T03D3797:114a-35: mngon par rtogs pa bstan pa de la rnam pa
T03D3797:114a-36: kun mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs su lam thams cad
T03D3797:114a-37: nyams su blangs pas lam thams rdzogs par 'byung bas
T03D3797:114a-38: na rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:114b-0: de la dang por rtse mor @114b phyin pa'i rtags bstan /
T03D3797:114b-1: de'i 'og tu bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par 'phel ba bstan /
T03D3797:114b-3: de'i 'og tu sems kun tu gnas pa bstan /
T03D3797:114b-4: brtan pa dang sems kun tu gnas pa la khyad ci yod ces na /
T03D3797:114b-5: sems can gyi don sna tshogs pa byed kyang de
T03D3797:114b-6: kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral
T03D3797:114b-7: bas na brtan pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:114b-8: de kho na nyid la sems rtse gcig pas ni sems kun tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:114b-9: de la rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i drod la sogs pa ni rtags dang /
T03D3797:114b-14: 'o na skabs dang po'i nges 'byed dang khyad ci yod ce na /
T03D3797:114b-15: skabs dang por mtshan nyid tsam bstan la /
T03D3797:114b-16: 'dir ni 'bras bu dngos su bstan to //
T03D3797:114b-17: 'o na mthar gyis pa'i nges 'byed dang khyad ci yod ce na /
T03D3797:114b-18: 'bring dang chen po'i khyad par yod do //
T03D3797:114b-19: de'i 'og tu mthong ba'i lam bstan /
T03D3797:114b-20: de'i 'og tu spang bya gzung ba'i rtog pa dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bstan /
T03D3797:114b-21: de la 'jug pa'i phyogs dang ldog pa'i phyogs kyi
T03D3797:114b-22: rten can gyi bya brag gis gzung ba'i rtog pa
T03D3797:114b-24: de bzhin du gang zag rdzas su yod pa dang /
T03D3797:114b-25: skyes bu btags par yod pa'i bye brag gis 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yang rnam pa gnyis so //
T03D3797:114b-26: de la gzung ba'i rtog pa 'jug pa'i phyogs byang chub sems dpa'i lam du gzung ba'o //
T03D3797:114b-27: ldog pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du gzung ba'o //
T03D3797:114b-28: de la 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gang zag rdzas su
T03D3797:114b-29: yod pa ni gang zag gi rdzas kyi bdag tu
T03D3797:114b-30: 'dzin pa'o // skyes bu btags par yod pa ni chos kyi bdag tu 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3797:114b-31: de la mthong ba'i lam skad cig ma bcu drug yin la /
T03D3797:114b-32: de mthong bas spang bar bya ba rdzogs par ni bcu drug pas spang ngo //
T03D3797:114b-33: de la bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs
T03D3797:114b-34: pa chung ngu 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis
T03D3797:114b-35: go rims bzhin dus dgu la rnam pa dgu yin
T03D3797:114b-36: la de spong ba la ltos te /
T03D3797:114b-37: bsgom pa'i lam yang rnam pa dgu yin no //
T03D3797:114b-38: de las dgu ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T03D3797:115a-1: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste dgu'o //
T03D3797:115a-2: de la bsgom pa'i lam chung ngus ni nyon mongs pa chen po spong ngo //
T03D3797:115a-3: de bzhin du gnyen po'i chung ngu'i chung du la
T03D3797:115a-4: sogs pa'i rim pas nyon mongs pa chen po'i chen
T03D3797:115a-5: po la sogs pa rim pas spong ngo //
T03D3797:115a-6: de la nyon mongs pa ni 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi
T03D3797:115a-7: rten can la sogs pa re re la yang chen
T03D3797:115a-8: po'i chen po'i la sogs pa'i rim pas dgu dgu
T03D3797:115a-9: yin la / de bzhin du gnyen po yang chung
T03D3797:115a-10: ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i rim pa dgu dgu
T03D3797:115a-11: yin la / yin te / de ltar na bsgom
T03D3797:115a-12: pa'i lam ni sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro
T03D3797:115a-13: yin la / yin te / // de'i 'og tu
T03D3797:115a-14: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba
T03D3797:115a-15: bsgom pa'i lam gyi khyad par gyi lam bstan to
T03D3797:115a-16: yin la / yin te / // // khyad par
T03D3797:115a-17: gyi lam gyi gnas skabs na log par rtog pa
T03D3797:115a-18: kun spong bas log rtog sel ba bstan to //
T03D3797:115a-19: de la rgyu 'bras kyi rim pa ni rnam pa
T03D3797:115a-20: kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i nges 'byed rnams
T03D3797:115a-21: rtse mo'i rtags la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i sbyor
T03D3797:115a-22: ba'o // phyir mi ldog pa ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3797:115a-23: zhing dag pa ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o //
T03D3797:115a-24: thabs mkhas pa ni log rtog sel ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3797:115a-25: rtse mo zhes bya ba rab kyi sbyor ba bstan nas de nyid dbang du bya ba'i phyir ram /
T03D3797:115a-26: nyams na phyir gso bar bya ba'i phyir mthar gyis pa zhes bya ba go rims kyi sbyor ba'o //
T03D3797:115a-27: de la sngar ni lugs dang mthun pa dang /
T03D3797:115a-28: thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa tshol ba zhes nyams su blangs pa'o //
T03D3797:115a-29: mthar gyis pa'i skabs su ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T03D3797:115a-30: rjes su dran pa drug dang /
T03D3797:115a-31: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang bcu
T03D3797:115a-32: gsum sbyor lam nas sa bcu'i bar du go rims
T03D3797:115a-33: bzhin du bsgoms pas mthar gyis pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:115a-34: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ka bsdus so //
T03D3797:115a-35: de la rjes su dran pa drug ni sangs rgyas
T03D3797:115a-36: dang chos dang dge 'dun dang sbyin pa dang tshul
T03D3797:115a-37: khrims dang bsam gtan gyi yon tan go rims bzhin
T03D3797:115a-38: du dran pa'i rjes su dran pa drug go //
T03D3797:115a-39: de nyams pa ni sa bdun pa man chad du'o //
T03D3797:115a-40: de la ltos te nyams pa gso ba'o //
T03D3797:115a-41: dbang du bya ba ni sa bcu thob pa nyid
T03D3797:115b-0: du bya @115b ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du bsgom
T03D3797:115b-1: pa'o // de las bdun pa man cad du ni
T03D3797:115b-2: cha yin pas rtse mo zhes btags par 'dus la
T03D3797:115b-3: pa'o // / de nyams pa gso ba zhes bya
T03D3797:115b-4: ba la ltos te rtse mo nyams pa gso ba
T03D3797:115b-5: pa'o // / zhes bya'o // mtshan nyid pa ni
T03D3797:115b-6: sa bcu'i gnas skabs na yod pa de la ni
T03D3797:115b-8: de'i dbang du byas nas de'i dbang du bya ba'i phyir mthar gyis bsgom pa'o //
T03D3797:115b-9: de ltar na mthar gyis pa ni rnam pa gnyis so //
T03D3797:115b-10: de la nyams pa gso ba zhes bya ba ni dbang po rtul po la'o //
T03D3797:115b-11: dbang du bya ba yin pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i ni 'bring po la'o //
T03D3797:115b-12: mthar gyis pa yongs su rdzogs pa las skad cig
T03D3797:115b-13: ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya
T03D3797:115b-14: ba sbyor ba mthar phyin pa 'byung bas skad cig
T03D3797:115b-15: ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa bstan pa
T03D3797:115b-16: de la gong du bsgom pa'i lam thams cad skad
T03D3797:115b-17: cig ma gcig la rdzogs pas na skad cig ma
T03D3797:115b-18: gcig la mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:115b-19: de yang mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3797:115b-20: rnam par smin pa ma yin pa dang /
T03D3797:115b-24: de nyid skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'bras bu
T03D3797:115b-25: chos kyi sku 'byung bas de'i 'og tu chos kyi
T03D3797:115b-26: sku bstan pa de la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni
T03D3797:115b-27: ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul
T03D3797:115b-28: pa dang chos kyi sku ste rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3797:115b-29: de la ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o //
T03D3797:115b-30: chos kyi sku ni dri ma rnam par dag pa'o //
T03D3797:115b-31: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sa bcu'i mnga' bdag
T03D3797:115b-32: rnams dang lhan cig tu chos kyi longs spyod pa
T03D3797:115b-33: spyod pa'o // sprul pa'i sku ni nyan thos la
T03D3797:115b-34: sogs pa la snang la gzugs sna tshogs kyi rtag
T03D3797:115b-35: tu sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T03D3797:115b-36: de yang chos kyi sku las 'byung bas chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3797:115b-37: de ltar ni sku rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3797:115b-38: kha cig ni chos nyid dang chos kyi sku gcig
T03D3797:115b-39: pas na sku ni gsum kho na yin no zhes
T03D3797:115b-40: zer ro // de ni ma yin no //
T03D3797:115b-41: ngo bo nyid kyi sku la mdzad pa med pas
T03D3797:115b-42: na mdzad pa dang bcas pa zhes bya bar mi
T03D3797:116a-0: des na mdzad pa dang bcas pa zhes gsungs pas sku ni rnam @116a * //
T03D3797:116a-1: pa bzhi nyid du bzhed pa yin no //
T03D3797:116a-2: de ltar na skabs brgyad do //
T03D3797:116a-3: de la skabs brgyad kyi rim pa ni gnyis te /
T03D3797:116a-6: de la bstan pa'i rim pa ni rnam pa thams
T03D3797:116a-7: cad mkhyen pa nyid 'bras bur dang por bstan nas
T03D3797:116a-9: / skye ba'i rim pa ni de'i sbyor ba dang /
T03D3797:116a-12: de'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa
T03D3797:116a-13: kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs pa
T03D3797:116a-14: sbyor ba bzhi ni sngar bstan la /
T03D3797:116a-15: 'bras bu chos kyi sku ni phyis bstan to //
T03D3797:116a-16: de la skabs brgyad gang zag gcig gis nyams su
T03D3797:116a-17: blang ba'i rim pa ni mkhyen pa gsum thos pa'i
T03D3797:116a-18: shes rab kyis nges par byas nas /
T03D3797:116a-19: de nyid rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs
T03D3797:116a-20: pa yongs su tshol ba'i dus su rnam pa nas
T03D3797:116a-21: thabs mkhas pa'i bar du lam dang /
T03D3797:116a-22: lam gyi rim pa kun bsams pa'i shes rab kyis gtan la phab nas /
T03D3797:116a-23: sems bskyed pa man chad chos mchog yan chad du
T03D3797:116a-24: lam kun gyi sbyor ba nyams su blangs pa ni
T03D3797:116a-25: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs so //
T03D3797:116a-26: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa lam
T03D3797:116a-27: thams cad kyi rim pa kun sbyor ba nyams su
T03D3797:116a-28: blangs pas lam kun rdzogs pa ni rtse mo'o //
T03D3797:116a-29: de nyid nyams na gso ba'am /
T03D3797:116a-30: ma nyams kyang dbang du bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin bsgom pa ni mthar gyis pa'o //
T03D3797:116a-31: de ltar go rims bzhin du bsgoms pa las skad
T03D3797:116a-32: cig ma gcig pa la mngon par rdzogs par byang
T03D3797:116a-34: de nyid kyi skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'bras bu chos kyi sku 'byung ngo //
T03D3797:116a-35: de ni nyams su len pa'i rim pa'o //
T03D3797:116a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus pa /
T03D3797:116a-37: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku m'a ra shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
